notification.news_and_updates: News and Updates: Receive the latest news and updates on {{ communityName }} and your account. Types of content include newsletters, community interviews, construction progress, and account updates.
notification.points_and_rewards: Points and Rewards: Get weekly reminders to collect and view the points on your account. Points are a great way to engage with the community and are sometimes used to grant awards and rewards to our community members.
notification.no_notifications: You do not have any notifications
